1103230.name: Anodyne 2 - OST
1103230.description:
The official, 60+ minute OST of Anodyne 2: Return to Dust! Music from a wide variety of influences and genres, Melos Han-Tani will take you on a magical audio journey. A composer for nearly 10 years, Melos created the memorable soundtracks for games such as Anodyne, Even the Ocean, and All Our Asias.

How to listen

Once downloaded, navigate to the local folder that holds the files. They'll be under "Soundtrack", and you can move them around if you want.

Tracklist

All songs by Melos Han-Tani unless otherwise noted.
